attributes.action: Stop William Hague from spouting off until we know WHO used the chemicals in Syria.
attributes.additional_details: Islamic fundamentalists are renowned for sending their own to Paradise to further their own ends - they believe they are being rewarded for their sacrifice (though none of their religious or fanatical leaders have ever volunteered for that 'reward').  If it is found that the Damascus attack WAS perpetrated by insurgents or anybody other than regime forces THEN WILLIAM HAGUE SHOULD BE ORDERED TO RESIGN - ON THE SPOT.
